long_description: The Cannondale Synapse Carbon 4 Compact road bike uses an ultralight carbon frame and relaxed positioning for high performance comfort during endurance rides. Synapse carbon frame features optimized tube shaping to promote efficiency and comfort; frame geometry gives a more upright position than more race-oriented road frames. The rear part of the frame and the all-carbon fork feature the Cannondale Synapse Active Vibration Elimination (S.A.V.E.) technology for damping road vibration. FSA Energy compact crankset and 11-32 tooth cassette offer wide-ranging gear options for easy spinning no matter the gradient; BB30 bottom bracket enhances energy efficiency. BB30 bottom bracket enhances energy efficiency. SRAM Rival shifters and derailleurs supply precise, snappy shifts throughout the 20 gear combinations, all with a single lever movement. Fulcrum Racing 7 wheelset is wrapped with the fast-rolling Prolongo Kappo Evo tires for confident handling and speed. Pedals not included. Specs on the Cannondale Synapse Carbon 4 Compact road bike are subject to change.
